roleset.name: make civil, educate

roles.note: Not sure if a true agent can occur with the adjectival usages (or if this would be considered a verbal usage if it did occur), but it is there for symmetry with related verb.

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: Also , rex , PRO-1 try PRO-1 to be civilized and do nt resort to childish name calling .

example.name: With manner
example.text: He became civilized by eating bread and drinking wine.
example.arg: by eating bread and drinking wine

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.
